sentences.sContent: He lit upon some jest books in the bookstore.
sentences.sContent_eng: He lit upon some jest books in the bookstore.
sentences.sCn: 他在书店偶然发现了一些笑话集。

sentences.sContent: You can find these books in any local bookstore.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can find these books in any local bookstore.
sentences.sCn: 你在当地的任一所书店都能找到此类书。

sentences.sContent: The technology bookstore: Browse for books on these and other technical topics.
sentences.sContent_eng: The technology bookstore: Browse for books on these and other technical topics.
sentences.sCn: 技术书店：浏览关于这些主题和其他技术主题的图书。
